title: Dr John Lynch COS Mayor's Office (Office of the Mayor)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Washington Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

All records and communications that are sent to, received from, or mention Dr. John Lynch (or Dr. Lynch), for the period from July 1, 2021, through November 30, 2021. This request includes, but is not limited to, emails, memos, notes, texts, and reports, in any format, that are maintained by the City of Seattle and its departments.

To clarify, the requested documents should include any records that contain either "Dr. Lynch" or "Dr. John Lynch" within the specified time frame. The scope of this request encompasses all forms of communication, including digital and physical formats.

Please note that if specific portions of the documents are exempt from disclosure by law, I request that the remaining parts of the documents be released, with the exempt sections redacted.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Concerned Parties
